title: Meat Lantern

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have 4 people disappear due to Meat Lantern's ability

desc:
Post 4864
Lcorp Teth
Threat 41
When visited, roll 6 D20
If none of them is either a 1 or 20 trigger the below ability
The visitor will become "Trapped".
The next time they try to visit they will disappear from the town, dying.
Defense, death immunity, healing or otherwise causes of death negation cannot save you from this death
Visitors will share the same fate if they choose the "Trapped" person
Only one person can be "Trapped" at a time
